attributes.action: Baroness Dido Harding is incompetent and should not be in charge of NIHP
attributes.additional_details: We need someone who has expertise and experience in dealing with these crises. Not someone who is best mates with Tory MPs. Peoples lives are at stake here, forget Tory loyalties.
attributes.background: Refuse to allow Matt Hancock to give his mate  Baroness Dido Harding charge of the new National Institute of Health Protection (NIHP) When’s she’s been found to be incompetent at Talk Talk and Gov UK track and trace.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments. That includes calling for someone to lose their job.
